passive.name: ICEBORN SUBJUGATION
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ICEBORN SUBJUGATION
                                When an enemy champion dies near Lissandra, they become a Frozen Thrall that seeks out living enemies.Frozen Thralls slow nearby enemies by 25% and shatter after 4 seconds, dealing 110 magic damage (110 + 40% ).

q.name: (Q) ICE SHARD
q.description:
(Q) ICE SHARD
 7/6/5/4s   55 
                                
                                
                                Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage 70 (70/110/150/190 + 70% ) and slowing the target by 20/25/30/35% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies behind the target take the same damage and are also slowed.

w.name: (W) RING OF FROST
w.description:
(W) RING OF FROST
 10/9/8/7s   40 
                                
                                
                                Creates an ice field, rooting enemies within for 1.25/1.35/1.45/1.55 seconds and dealing 55 magic damage (55/100/145/190 + 55% ).

e.name: (E) GLACIAL PATH
e.description:
(E) GLACIAL PATH
 19/16/13/10s   85 
                                
                                
                                First Cast: Casts forth an ice claw that deals 50 magic damage (50/95/140/185 + 40% )  when it hits enemies in its path. Can be recast while the ice claw is moving.Recast: Lissandra teleports to the ice claw, which then disappears.

r.name: (R) FROZEN TOMB
r.description:
(R) FROZEN TOMB
 75/66/57s   100 
                                
                                
                                Summons dark ice on an enemy champion or herself. Dark ice emanates from the target for 3 seconds, dealing 150 magic damage  (150/250/350 + 75%  ) and slowing enemies it touches by 30/45/60%.Cast on enemies: Encases an enemy champion in dark ice, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.Self-Cast: Encases herself in dark ice, entering stasis for 2.5 seconds and restoring 100 Health  (100/150/200 + 40% ) , increased by 0% - 100% based on her missing Health. Maximum healing is granted when her Health drops to 30% or lower.When auto-aiming, self-casts Frozen Tomb automatically.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.
